message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to make you a offer. After careful consideration, I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $11,000 is still a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering my needs and the value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $11,000 is still a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you and the original price I had in mind.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. However, I'm still a little bit over budget. I'm prepared to pay $10,250 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for me and the fact that we're both coming to a compromise.

I understand that $10,250 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,375. This is as close as I can get to your offer while still making a reasonable profit.

Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to go up to $10,100. This is a fair price considering the value to me and the fact that we've both made compromises. I hope we can reach an agreement at this point.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,200. This is as close as I can get to your offer while still making a reasonable profit.
